ygData.subject: Re:  Pickled recipes (was Re: Muddy Work)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Okay, the recipe for Pickled Gator (or any pickled product, for that matter) in the cookbook is wrong.  It does not work.  What you do is put meat,
ygData.messageBody:
>Now that I'm back in Freeport, I came across some
>Gator Meat and have the recipe, but not the jar.
>Meat+Vinegar+Sauces in Jar.
>
>Question is, what size Jar?

Okay, the recipe for Pickled Gator (or any pickled product, for that
matter) in the cookbook is wrong. It does not work. What you do is put
meat, vinegar, and sauce in a spit and hit combine. No jar is needed.
Strange I know, but that's how the recipe works now ^_^. Go figure.

Kishu Arashi
23rd level Ranger
Xegony
Master Potter, Master Fletcher
